languages.text: {n}Из вокса Паскаля изливается сложная, монументально пронзительная бинарная ария. В ее сигналах зашифровано право Ханейманна приказывать на данном корабле. Уставившись на Паскаля глазами-визорами, сервитор неуклюже склоняет голову в поклоне.{/n} "Регалии опознаны. Приветствую почтенного магоса, исполняю повеление. Лифтовая система активирована".

{n}An intricate, monumental, and piercing binharic aria pours from Pasqal's vox. Encoded in its signals is Haneumann's authority to give orders on this ship. The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."
languages.original_text: {n}Из вокса Паскаля изливается сложная, монументально пронзительная бинарная ария. В ее сигналах зашифровано право Ханейманна приказывать на данном корабле. Уставившись на Паскаля глазами-визорами, сервитор неуклюже склоняет голову в поклоне.{/n} "Регалии опознаны. Приветствую почтенного магоса, исполняю повеление. Лифтовая система активирована".

The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."

languages.text: {n}高音かつ複雑なビンハリックの讃美歌がパスカルのヴォクスから堂々と流れ出す。その信号には、この船に命令を下すヘニュマンの権限がエンコードされている。サーヴィターはパスカルをバイザーで覆われた瞳で見つめると、気まずげに頭を下げる。{/n}「レガリアを識別。尊いマゴスを歓迎し、現在の命令を実行する。リフト系統を稼働します」
languages.original_text: {n}An intricate, monumental, and piercing binharic aria pours from Pasqal's vox. Encoded in its signals is Haneumann's authority to give orders on this ship. The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."

traits.locale_text: {n}高音かつ複雑なビンハリックの讃美歌がパスカルのヴォクスから堂々と流れ出す。その信号には、この船に命令を下すヘニュマンの権限がエンコードされている。サーヴィターはパスカルをバイザーで覆われた瞳で見つめると、気まずげに頭を下げる。{/n}「レガリアを識別。尊いマゴスを歓迎し、現在の命令を実行する。リフト系統を稼働します」

languages.text: {n}一段复杂、恢弘而又刺耳的二进制语咏叹调从帕斯卡的音阵装置中倾泻而出，这段信号中的编码象征着哈努曼在船上发号施令的权力。带着面甲的机仆盯着帕斯卡，笨拙地低下了头。{/n}“已识别特权。向尊敬的贤者致以问候，我马上执行命令。升降系统已启动。”
languages.original_text: {n}An intricate, monumental, and piercing binharic aria pours from Pasqal's vox. Encoded in its signals is Haneumann's authority to give orders on this ship. The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."

traits.locale_text: {n}一段复杂、恢弘而又刺耳的二进制语咏叹调从帕斯卡的音阵装置中倾泻而出，这段信号中的编码象征着哈努曼在船上发号施令的权力。带着面甲的奴工盯着帕斯卡，笨拙地低下了头。{/n}“已识别特权。向尊敬的贤者致以问候，我马上执行命令。升降系统已启动。”

languages.text: {n}Une aria binhaire complexe, monumentale et perçante se déverse du vox de Pasqal. Dans son signal est encodée l'autorisation d'Haneumann de donner des ordres sur ce vaisseau. Le servitor fixe Pasqal de ses viseurs avant d'incliner maladroitement la tête.{/n} « Autorité souveraine identifiée. Je salue l'honorable magos et vais mettre ses ordres à exécution sur-le-champ. Système de l'ascenseur rétabli. »
languages.original_text: {n}An intricate, monumental, and piercing binharic aria pours from Pasqal's vox. Encoded in its signals is Haneumann's authority to give orders on this ship. The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une aria binhaire complexe, monumentale et perçante se déverse du vox de Pasqal. Dans son signal est encodée l'autorisation d'Haneumann de donner des ordres sur ce vaisseau. Le servitor fixe Pasqal de ses viseurs avant d'incliner maladroitement la tête.{/n} « Autorité souveraine identifiée. Je salue l'honorable magos et vais mettre ses ordres à exécution sur-le-champ. Système de l'ascenseur rétabli. »

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite una compleja, monumental y penetrante aria binaria. Codificada en sus señales está la autoridad de Haneumann para dar órdenes en esta nave. El servidor observa a Pasqal con sus ojos cubiertos por el visor e inclina la cabeza con un gesto torpe.{/n} «Insignia confirmada. Lo saludo, venerable magos. Ejecutaré la orden inmediatamente. Sistema de ascensores activado».
languages.original_text: {n}An intricate, monumental, and piercing binharic aria pours from Pasqal's vox. Encoded in its signals is Haneumann's authority to give orders on this ship. The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite una compleja, monumental y penetrante aria binaria. Codificada en sus señales está la autoridad de Haneumann para dar órdenes en esta nave. El servidor observa a Pasqal con sus ojos cubiertos por el visor e inclina la cabeza con un gesto torpe.{/n} «Insignia confirmada. Lo saludo, venerable magos. Ejecutaré la orden inmediatamente. Sistema de ascensores activado».

languages.text: {n}Eine komplexe, monumentale und durchdringende binhäre Arie ertönt aus Pasqals Vox. In ihren Signalen ist die Bestätigung verschlüsselt, dass Haneumann die Autorität besitzt, auf diesem Schiff Befehle zu erteilen. Der Servitor starrt Pasqal aus seinem Visor heraus an und verneigt sich unbeholfen.{/n} "Insignien identifiziert. Ich grüße den ehrenwerten Magos und führe den Befehl augenblicklich aus. Liftsystem aktiviert."
languages.original_text: {n}An intricate, monumental, and piercing binharic aria pours from Pasqal's vox. Encoded in its signals is Haneumann's authority to give orders on this ship. The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine komplexe, monumentale und durchdringende binhäre Arie ertönt aus Pasqals Vox. In ihren Signalen ist die Bestätigung verschlüsselt, dass Haneumann die Autorität besitzt, auf diesem Schiff Befehle zu erteilen. Der Servitor starrt Pasqal aus seinem Visor heraus an und verneigt sich unbeholfen.{/n} "Insignien identifiziert. Ich grüße den ehrenwerten Magos und führe den Befehl augenblicklich aus. Liftsystem aktiviert."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan detaylı, abidevi, bıçak gibi bir ikilidil arya dökülüyor. Sinyallerinde, Haneumann'ın bu gemiye emir verme yetkisi kodlu. Hizmetör, vizör gözleriyle Pasqal'a bakıp tuhaf bir biçimde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Rütbe sembolü tanımlandı. Muhterem Magos'u selamlıyor ve emrini derhâl yerine getiriyorum. Asansör sistemi devreye sokuldu."
languages.original_text: {n}An intricate, monumental, and piercing binharic aria pours from Pasqal's vox. Encoded in its signals is Haneumann's authority to give orders on this ship. The servitor stares at Pasqal with visored eyes and bows his head awkwardly.{/n} "Regalia identified. I greet the venerable Magos and will execute the order presently. Lift system activated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan detaylı, abidevi, bıçak gibi bir ikilidil arya dökülüyor. Sinyallerine, Haneumann'ın bu gemiye emir verme yetkisi kodlanmış durumda. Hizmetör, vizörlü gözleriyle Pasqal'a bakıyor ve tuhaf bir biçimde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Rütbe sembolü tanımlandı. Muhterem Magos'u selamlıyor ve emrini derhâl yerine getiriyorum. Asansör sistemi devreye sokuldu."
